title: Time to rock
author: VD
content_html:
The Amazon surge is on… as of the first hour, TIA stands at:

#1,291
#8 in Atheism

Amazon updates hourly, so if you happen to be up, please post the rankings here in the comments as they change. Thanks very much!

UPDATE – #311, #4 in Atheism

Strangely enough, the reviews all disappeared from Amazon. I suspect this might have something to do with the fact that the book is still official pre-release even though Amazon has been shipping the book for a week. I’ll let you know if we find out anything, otherwise, we’ll see if they reappear in two weeks or not.
content_text:
The Amazon surge
is on… as of the first hour, TIA stands at:
#1,291
#8 in Atheism
Amazon updates hourly, so if you happen to be up, please post the rankings here in the comments as they change.  Thanks very much!
UPDATE – #311, #4 in Atheism
Strangely enough, the reviews all disappeared from Amazon.  I suspect this might have something to do with the fact that the book is still official pre-release even though Amazon has been shipping the book for a week.  I’ll let you know if we find out anything, otherwise, we’ll see if they reappear in two weeks or not.
